name: flickr.galleries.getInfo
authentication: This method does not require authentication.

arguments.name: api_key
arguments.description: Your API application key.See herefor more details.

arguments.name: gallery_id
arguments.description: The gallery ID you are requesting information for.

arguments.name: cover_photos_size
arguments.description: size of the cover photos (excluding the primary photo)

arguments.name: limit
arguments.description: number of cover photos to fetch for galleries without a primary photo. Default is 6

arguments.name: short_limit
arguments.description: number of cover photos to fetch (excluding primary photo) for galleries with a primary photo. Default is 2.

response:
<gallery id="6065-72157617483228192" url="http://www.flickr.com/photos/straup/galleries/72157617483228192" owner="35034348999@N01" primary_photo_id="292882708" date_create="1241028772" date_update="1270111667" count_photos="17" count_videos="0" primary_photo_server="112" primary_photo_farm="1" primary_photo_secret="7f29861bc4">
  <title>Cat Pictures I've Sent To Kevin Collins</title>
  <description />
</gallery>

errors.title: Invalid API KeyThe API key passed was not valid or has expired.
Service currently unavailableThe requested service is temporarily unavailable.
Write operation failedThe requested operation failed due to a temporary issue.
Format "xxx" not foundThe requested response format was not found.
Method "xxx" not foundThe requested method was not found.
Invalid SOAP envelopeThe SOAP envelope send in the request could not be parsed.
Invalid XML-RPC Method CallThe XML-RPC request document could not be parsed.
Bad URL foundOne or more arguments contained a URL that has been used for abuse on Flickr.
